paragraphs.content: And as they did eat, Jesus took bread and blessed it, and brake, and gave to them, and said, Take it, and eat.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And as they did eat, Jesus took bread and blessed it, and brake, and gave to them, and said, Take it, and eat.

paragraphs.content: Behold, this is for you to do in remembrance of my body; for as oft as ye do this ye will remember this hour that I was with you.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Behold, this is for you to do in remembrance of my body; for as oft as ye do this ye will remember this hour that I was with you.

paragraphs.content: And he took the cup, and when he had given thanks, he gave it to them; and they all drank of it.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And he took the cup, and when he had given thanks, he gave it to them; and they all drank of it.

paragraphs.content: And he said unto them, This is in remembrance of my blood which is shed for many, and the new testament which I give unto you; for of me ye shall bear record unto all the world.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And he said unto them, This is in remembrance of my blood which is shed for many, and the new testament which I give unto you; for of me ye shall bear record unto all the world.

paragraphs.content: And as oft as ye do this ordinance, ye will remember me in this hour that I was with you and drank with you of this cup, even the last time in my ministry.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And as oft as ye do this ordinance, ye will remember me in this hour that I was with you and drank with you of this cup, even the last time in my ministry.

paragraphs.content: Verily I say unto you, Of this ye shall bear record; for I will no more drink of the fruit of the vine with you, until that day that I drink it new in the kingdom of God.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Verily I say unto you, Of this ye shall bear record; for I will no more drink of the fruit of the vine with you, until that day that I drink it new in the kingdom of God.

paragraphs.content: And now they were grieved, and wept over him.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And now they were grieved, and wept over him.

paragraphs.content: And they came to a place which was named Gethsemane, which was a garden; and the disciples began to be sore amazed, and to be very heavy, and to complain in their hearts, wondering if this be the Messiah.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And they came to a place which was named Gethsemane, which was a garden; and the disciples began to be sore amazed, and to be very heavy, and to complain in their hearts, wondering if this be the Messiah.

paragraphs.content: And Jesus knowing their hearts, said to his disciples, Sit ye here, while I shall pray.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Jesus knowing their hearts, said to his disciples, Sit ye here, while I shall pray.

paragraphs.content: And he taketh with him, Peter, and James, and John, and rebuked them, and said unto them, My soul is exceeding sorrowful, even unto death; tarry ye here and watch.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And he taketh with him, Peter, and James, and John, and rebuked them, and said unto them, My soul is exceeding sorrowful, even unto death; tarry ye here and watch.
